document_data.name: Fuorn
document_data.mainbody:
'''Fuorn''' the Treant-King was an old and magnificent [[treant]] that ruled and watched over the [[Forgotten Forest]] ''circa'' the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Then well I wish you—but not here. I will have no battles in my forest.|Fuorn, to Melegaunt Tanthul.}}
document_data.Description: He appeared as a {{SIAdj|20|ft|long=yes|adj=tall}} [[oak]] tree, the tallest of his treant circle, with a crown of leaves atop his brow.
document_data.Personality: Fuorn was somewhat gruff treant, but generally friendly to those that did not harm his woods.
document_data.Relationships: He was friend and ally of [[Turlang]], who resided in his [[Turlang's Wood|namesake woods]] in the [[High Forest]].
document_data.History:
Centuries before the [[Era of Upheaval]], Fuorn recovered the ''[[staff of the Shard]]'' from the [[Marsh of Chelimber]] and safeguarded it on behalf of the goddess [[Selûne]].

Fuorn and his fellow treants met the [[Prince of Shade]] [[Melegaunt Tanthul]], along with his companions [[Galaeron Nihmedu]] and [[Vala Thorsdotter]] in the {{YearlinkName|1371}}. He accepted from Melegaunt a ''[[shadowstorm seed]]'', an acorn-like item that could whirl combatting foes away into the [[Shadowfell]] or create a sudden downpour of cold dark rain.
